attributes.action: Given a choice & not fined for keeping child home parents with Health-Conditions
attributes.additional_details: Allow decision to remain safe from risk of death for family's with underline health conditions such as diabetes, cancer, asthma & more not too be penalized & fined support with home remote learning ensure they have education maintained until vaccine stop the spread and risk of deaths needlessly and help most vulnerable family's from risk that would damage there children mentally if they would be to lose there parents to the pandemic.
attributes.background: To have a choice not be fined & forced keep child at school during pandemic if child's family has health condition's & are risk of death if child brings covid19 home would impact child if lost parents mentally remote learn until vaccine for family's most at risk of death & are  vulnerable.
